duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and maintain brand level and aggregated overall business demand plans for a complex product mix.
Identify, investigate, and resolve key exceptions and anomalies across markets and categories to inform demand plans.
Develop and optimize new and existing data sources and use available customer data appropriately to understand key metrics within the customer.
Utilize analytical and statistical forecasting methods to drive an optimum forward demand.
Work cross-functionally with brands and account teams to understand the latest thinking for customer activity and incorporate it into demand plan.
Support new product forecasting with a cross-functional team to gain alignment across all parties and minimize inventory risk.
Play an active role in the S&OP process to drive alignment between demand plan and financial forecast.
Develop and maintain a set of in-market Demand Plan SOP’s and contribution through Global forums to the development of Global Demand processes and systems.
Own and drive improvements against the defined KPI’s.
Act as subject matter Expert for the Region.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Supply Chain, or a related field (Master's preferred)
